name: Squirrel
help: Squirrel is both a set of tools and a library, to completely manage both installation and updating your Desktop Windows application, written in either C# or any other language (i.e., Squirrel can manage native C++ applications).

properties.name: Releasify
properties.help: Update or generate a releases directory with a given NuGet package.

properties.name: ReleaseDir
properties.help: Path to a release directory to use with releasify.

properties.name: Icon
properties.help: Path to an ICO file that will be used for icon shortcuts.

properties.name: LoadingGif
properties.help: Path to an animated GIF to be displayed during installation.

properties.name: Install
properties.help: Install the app whose package is in the specified directory.

properties.name: Download
properties.help: Download the releases specified by the URL and write new results to stdout as JSON.

properties.name: CheckForUpdate
properties.help: Check for one available update and writes new results to stdout as JSON
